domain_terms.Business Process: Structured set of activities that produce a specific output for customers or stakeholders
domain_terms.Process Automation: Use of technology to perform manual tasks without human intervention
domain_terms.Process Optimization: Systematic improvement of process efficiency and effectiveness
domain_terms.Process Digitization: Conversion of manual/paper processes to digital format
domain_terms.Business Process Management (BPM): Discipline of modeling, automating, and optimizing business processes
domain_terms.Robotic Process Automation (RPA): Software robots that automate repetitive rule-based tasks

framework_description: business processes, automation opportunities, digitization strategy, and process optimization
